marker.ph: /* Bir bütünleştirilmiş koda ilişkin Genel Bilgiler aşağıdaki öznitelikler kümesiyle ... */
/* ComVisible özniteliğinin false olarak ayarlanması bu bütünleştirilmiş koddaki türleri ... */
/* Yerelleştirilebilir uygulamalar oluşturmaya başlamak için, ... */
/* temaya özgü kaynak sözlüklerinin bulunduğu yer ... */
/* genel kaynak sözlüğünün bulunduğu yer ... */
/* Bir derlemenin sürüm bilgileri aşağıdaki dört değerden oluşur: ... */
/// AdminWindow.xaml etkileşim mantığı ...
/* AdminWindow win = new AdminWindow(); ... */

<<Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid Grid.Column="0"> <StackPanel> <TextBox Height="30" x:Name="tb_searchUser" TextChanged="tb_searchUser_textChange"/> <ListView x:Name="userListView" MouseDoubleClick="userListView_doubleClik"> <ListView.View> <GridView> <GridViewColumn Header="Kullanıcılar" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding uname}" Width="258"/> </GridView> </ListView.View> </ListView> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="2*"/> <RowDefinition Height="2*"/> <RowDefinition Height="1*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid Grid.Row="0"> <DockPanel> <Label x:Name="lbl_UserName" Content="Kullanıcı Adı" FontSize="30" Margin="10"/> <Label x:Name="lbl_realName" Content="Ad Soyad" FontSize="20" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <Label x:Name="lbl_TelNo" Content="Telefon" FontSize="20" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <Label x:Name="lbl_active" Content="Telefon" FontSize="20" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> </DockPanel> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="1"> <ListView x:Name="remark_ListView"> <ListView.View> <GridView> <GridViewColumn Header="Film Adı" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding usersFilm}" Width="130"/> <GridViewColumn Header="Yorum" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding remark}" Width="200"/> <GridViewColumn Header="+/-" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding isgood}" Width="20"/> </GridView> </ListView.View> </ListView> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="2"> <Button x:Name="btn_eject" Content="BANLA" Click="btn_eject_Click"/> </Grid> </Grid> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid Grid.Column="0"> <StackPanel> <TextBox Height="30" x:Name="tb_searchUser" TextChanged="tb_searchUser_textChange"/> <ListView x:Name="userListView" MouseDoubleClick="userListView_doubleClik"> <ListView.View> <GridView> <GridViewColumn Header="Kullanıcılar" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding uname}" Width="258"/> </GridView> </ListView.View> </ListView> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="2*"/> <RowDefinition Height="2*"/> <RowDefinition Height="1*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid Grid.Row="0"> <DockPanel> <Label x:Name="lbl_UserName" Content="Kullanıcı Adı" FontSize="30" Margin="10"/> <Label x:Name="lbl_realName" Content="Ad Soyad" FontSize="20" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <Label x:Name="lbl_TelNo" Content="Telefon" FontSize="20" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <Label x:Name="lbl_active" Content="Telefon" FontSize="20" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> </DockPanel> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="1"> <ListView x:Name="remark_ListView"> <ListView.View> <GridView> <GridViewColumn Header="Film Adı" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding usersFilm}" Width="130"/> <GridViewColumn Header="Yorum" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding remark}" Width="200"/> <GridViewColumn Header="+/-" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding isgood}" Width="20"/> </GridView> </ListView.View> </ListView> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="2"> <Button x:Name="btn_eject" Content="BANLA" Click="btn_eject_Click"/> </Grid> </Grid>.../>
<<ColumnDefinition Width="1*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*"/>.../>

<<Grid> <DockPanel> <Grid Width="390" Height="380" HorizontalAlignment="Left"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition Height="50"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid Grid.Row="0"> <ListView Name="FilmListView" MouseDoubleClick="FilmListView_DoubleClick"> <ListView.View> <GridView x:Name="gridViewOfFilmList"> <GridViewColumn Header="Rank" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding rank}" Width="45"/> <GridViewColumn Header="Fİlm NaMe" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding name}" Width="300"/> <GridViewColumn Header="Rate" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding rate}" Width="40"/> </GridView> </ListView.View> </ListView> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="1"> <DockPanel> <ComboBox x:Name="PageCbox" Grid.Column="0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="15,5" Cursor="Hand" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" SelectionChanged="PageCbox_SelectionChanged" Width="250" HorizontalAlignment="Left"> <ComboBoxItem Content="Sayfa numarası seçiniz" IsSelected="True"/> </ComboBox> <Button Grid.Column="1" Content="Başlat" x:Name="GetButton" Click="GetButton_Click" Margin="5,10,15,10" /> </DockPanel> </Grid> </Grid> <Grid Width="390" Height="380" HorizontalAlignment="Left"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="35"/> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition Height="50"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid Grid.Row="0"> <DockPanel> <Label Content="ARA"/> <TextBox x:Name="tb_searchFilm_inDB" TextChanged="tb_search_filmTextChange"/> </DockPanel> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="1"> <ListView Name="FilmListView_inDB" MouseDoubleClick="FilmListView_DoubleClick_inDB" > <ListView.View> <GridView x:Name="gridViewOfFilmList_inDB"> <GridViewColumn Header="Rank" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding rank}" Width="65"/> <GridViewColumn Header="Fİlm NaMe" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding name}" Width="320"/> </GridView> </ListView.View> </ListView> <ListView Name="FilmListView_search" MouseDoubleClick="FilmListView_DoubleClick_inDB" Width="0" HorizontalAlignment="Right"> <ListView.View> <GridView x:Name="gridViewOfFilmList_search"> <GridViewColumn Header="Rank" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding rank}"/> <GridViewColumn Header="Fİlm NaMe" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding name}"/> </GridView> </ListView.View> </ListView> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="2" Background="Turquoise"> <DockPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right"> <Button Click="btn_btn_Click" Height="30" Width="88" Content="Yenile" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Margin="10,0"/> <Button Click="btn_editUser_Click" Height="30" Width="88" Content="Kullanıcı Düzenle" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Margin="10,0"/> </DockPanel> </Grid> </Grid>
</DockPanel> </Grid>.../>

/// AdminWindow.xaml etkileşim mantığı ...
/* AdminWindow win = new AdminWindow(); ... */
/* Bir bütünleştirilmiş koda ilişkin Genel Bilgiler aşağıdaki öznitelikler kümesiyle ... */
/* ComVisible özniteliğinin false olarak ayarlanması bu bütünleştirilmiş koddaki türleri ... */
/* Yerelleştirilebilir uygulamalar oluşturmaya başlamak için, ... */
/* temaya özgü kaynak sözlüklerinin bulunduğu yer ... */
/* genel kaynak sözlüğünün bulunduğu yer ... */
/* Bir derlemenin sürüm bilgileri aşağıdaki dört değerden oluşur: ... */
